meanings.definition: Wooden paneling on the lower part of a room's walls.
meanings.sent1: The wainscotting in the dining room adds a cozy feel to the space.
meanings.sent2: The old house had beautiful wainscotting in the living room.
meanings.sent3: As the cat climbed the wainscotting, it left tiny claw marks behind.
meanings.sent4: The wainscotting stood like a loyal guard, protecting the walls from scuffs and marks.
meanings.sent5: The wainscotting, with its intricate patterns, whispered stories of the past.

meanings.definition: To cover or line with wooden paneling.
meanings.sent1: We decided to wainscotting the study to give it a more traditional look.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter will wainscotting the hallway next week.
meanings.sent3: She wainscotting the room so well, it looked like a cozy cabin.
meanings.sent4: The artist wainscotting the gallery walls, turning them into a rustic masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The homeowner wainscotting the entire house, transforming it into a warm retreat.
